body.p: In March 2002 the International Accounting Standards Board issued SIC‑32 Intangible Assets—Web Site Costs, which had originally been developed by the Standing Interpretations Committee of the International Accounting Standards Committee.

variants.p: Other Standards have made minor consequential amendments to SIC‑32, including IFRS 15 Revenue from Contracts with Customers (issued May 2014), IFRS 16 Leases (issued January 2016) and Amendments to References to the Conceptual Framework in IFRS Standards (issued March 2018).
